plot: Restaurant serves up bad service with a side of attitude. Gale Harold plays a sexy, badass waiter to Ria Bellafiore, Josh Meyers, and Tara Copeland. Chef Ludo makes a special cameo ...
title: Cafe Attitude
plot_es: Restaurant serves up bad service with a side of attitude. Gale Harold plays a sexy, badass waiter to Ria Bellafiore, Josh Meyers, and Tara Copeland. Chef Ludo makes a special cameo ...
